hero.title: About Discover Natural Ability
hero.subtitle: Building the Future of Youth Sports Development

origin.title: Our Origin Story
origin.body: Through direct field experience with professional athletes, sports institutions, and parents of developing athletes, we discovered a critical gap: Many athletes train consistently, yet lack real clarity about their level or how they are progressing over time. Parents support their children, but often struggle to see tangible results that can be understood or followed. At the same time, institutions invest significant effort, without a unified system that clearly demonstrates long-term value. Discover Natural Ability was created to address this gap.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Discover does not add a new program—it creates a real development journey, measured on the field, documented digitally, with achievements that are displayed on walls and carry the institution's name in the child's memory for years.

i1.title: Structured Assessment Framework
i1.body: Scientific, field-based assessments that measure natural athletic abilities in realistic environments

i2.title: Digital Development Profiles
i2.body: Comprehensive athlete profiles that track progress, stages, and achievements over time

i3.title: Clear Stage Progression
i3.body: Transparent development stages that show exactly where athletes stand and where they're heading

i4.title: Meaningful Recognition
i4.body: Physical medals and digital achievements that represent real milestones, not just participation

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.body: We work exclusively with institutional partners—academies, schools, sports clubs, and government entities—to provide a layer of organization and clarity that enhances what already exists, without changing training methods or interfering with operations.
